 2

 3 
 Click "Folder Options. ..".
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cd\/Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-4-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-4-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/c\/cd\/Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-4-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-4-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570}

 Click "View". 
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/bf\/Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-5-Version-2.jpg\/v4-460px-Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/b\/bf\/Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-5-Version-2.jpg\/v4-760px-Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-5-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":343.1043956044,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":566.86813186813} 
 5 Look for the subcategory called "Hidden Files and Folders"
 {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e8\/Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-6-Version-2.jpg\/v4-459px-Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-6-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/e\/e8\/Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-6-Version-2.jpg\/v4-759px-Un-Hide-Folders-and-Files-on-XP-Step-6-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":342.47252747253,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":565.82417582418} 
 6 
 Check off the "Show hidden files and folders" radio button.
